app.description: Helps you track time spent on tickets.
app.name: Time Tracking

time_field_id.label: Time Field ID
time_field_id.helpText: The ID of a custom numeric field that will hold the total time.

time_object_field_id.label: Config Field ID
time_object_field_id.helpText: The ID of a custom multi-line field that will hold the config/timelogs.

auto_pause_resume.label: Auto Pause/Resume
auto_pause_resume.helpText: The time will pause when the focus on the ticket is lost and resume itself as soon as the agent is back on the ticket.

manual_pause_resume.label: Manual Pause/Resume/Reset
manual_pause_resume.helpText: Agent can manually pause/resume/reset the timer.

reset.label: Reset current time
reset.helpText: Agent can reset his current time spent on a ticket.

modal.body: The system shows that you spent the following time on this ticket, you can either edit it or leave it as is and click "Save Ticket".

errors.save_hook: You need to submit a time before saving this ticket!
